getVoicePrompt().Description: Return the message informing the user of the problem, as per @B_android#app#VoiceInteractor#AbortVoiceRequest_E@.

sendAbortResult(android.os.Bundle).Description: Report that the voice interactor has finished aborting the voice operation, resulting in a call to @B_android#app#VoiceInteractor#AbortVoiceRequest#onAbortResult_E@. This finishes the request (it is no longer active).

getMessage().Description: Prefer @B_android#service#voice#VoiceInteractionSession#AbortVoiceRequest#getVoicePrompt_E@ which allows a separate visual message. Return the message informing the user of the problem, as per @B_android#app#VoiceInteractor#AbortVoiceRequest_E@.
getMessage().history: Added in API level 23 Deprecated in API level 23

ClassDesc: A request to report that the current user interaction can not be completed with voice, as per @B_android#app#VoiceInteractor#AbortVoiceRequest_E@.
